bibl.title: Recent Research on Trade in the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean (1st c. - 7th c.).
bibl.note: Article compte rendu de: David PEACOCK and Lucy BLUE (Edd.), assisted by Darren GLAZIER, The Ancient Red Sea Port of Adulis, Eritrea. Results of the Eritro-British Expedition 2004-5 (Oxford, 2007); - David PEACOCK and David WILLIAMS (Edd.), Food for the Gods. New Light on the Ancient Incense Trade. Illustrations edited by Penny COPELAND (Oxford, 2007); - René J. CAPPERS, Roman Foodprints at Berenike. Archaeobotanical Evidence of Subsistence and Trade in the Eastern Desert of Egypt = University of California. Cotsen Institute of Archaeology. Monograph 55 (Los Angeles, 2006).
